scripts.serve: port=$(shuf -i 2000-65000 -n 1); echo serving on: :$port; ./node_modules/.bin/serve -Sn -p $port dist &   ./node_modules/.bin/lt -p $port -s $(whoami)$(basename $PWD | sed 's/[^a-z^0-9]*//g')
scripts.dev: npm run build; npm run serve & npm run watch
scripts.gh-pages: git add --all dist && git commit --allow-empty-message -m '' && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.install-psc-package-linux: echo Setting up PureScript && wget -qO - $(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/purescript/psc-package/releases/latest | grep 'browser_' | cut -d\" -f4 | grep linux64 | grep .tar.gz) | tar xvz -O psc-package/psc-package > ./node_modules/.bin/psc-package && ./node_modules/.bin/psc-package update
